abstract.shortdesc: The add-on for provides a basic graphical interface to interact with repositories, and reduces the amount of context switching between your editor and the command line or another client application.
abstract.note: The add-on requires version 20.1 or later.

ul.li: Push changes to a remote branch
Pull updates from a remote branch
Preview the history of a branch or file

conbody.p: When you install the add-on, the and Git History views become available in Author Mode. For more information about Author Mode views, see the help topic.
